@graph.rdfs:comment: Device components are also referenced in the paper's description, including a Toshiba TC58FYM7T8C NOR flash memory chip.
@graph.skos:definition: A class of counterfeit iPhone 4, with characteristics described in Section 4 of 'Fang J. et al. (2012) Forensic Analysis of Pirated Chinese Shanzhai Mobile Phones. In: Peterson G., Shenoi S. (eds) Advances in Digital Forensics VIII. DigitalForensics 2012. IFIP Advances in Information and Communication Technology, vol 383. Springer, Berlin, Heidelberg.'

@graph.uco-core:description: A device confirmed through manual review to be a member of a known class of counterfeit phone.
